meanings.definition: A collection of art installations made from sticks.
meanings.sent1: The stickworks in the park were truly impressive.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the stickworks displayed at the art gallery.
meanings.sent3: The stickworks at the museum made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she gazed at the stickworks in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The stickworks stood out among the other sculptures.

meanings.definition: The act of creating art installations using sticks.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed participating in the stickworks workshop.
meanings.sent2: The artist's passion for stickworks was evident in every piece.
meanings.sent3: The stickworks competition brought out the creativity in everyone.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to stickworks was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to celebrate the beauty of stickworks.
